BasePQRegistrationIntentMessage.description: Base PQ message structure for registration intent that appears in nested ETH messages.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Intent to pair ETH Address

fields.name: ethAddress
fields.description: ETH Address that will be paired with the PQ key

fields.name: pqNonce
fields.description: PQ nonce to prevent replay attacks

ETHRegistrationIntentMessage.description: ETH message containing nested PQ signature components and base PQ message for registration intent.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Intent to pair Epervier Key

fields.name: basePQMessage
fields.description: Base PQ message that was signed

fields.name: salt
fields.description: PQ signature salt component

fields.name: cs1
fields.description: PQ signature cs1 component

fields.name: cs2
fields.description: PQ signature cs2 component

fields.name: hint
fields.description: PQ signature hint component

fields.name: ethNonce
fields.description: ETH nonce to prevent replay attacks

BaseETHRegistrationConfirmationMessage.description: ETH message that gets signed and embedded in the PQ confirmation message.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Confirm bonding to Epervier Fingerprint

fields.name: pqFingerprint
fields.description: PQ Fingerprint (derived from PQ public key)

fields.name: ethNonce
fields.description: ETH nonce to prevent replay attacks

PQRegistrationConfirmationMessage.description: PQ-controlled confirmation of registration, with nested ETH signature and message.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Confirm bonding to ETH Address

fields.name: ethAddress
fields.description: ETH Address being bound to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: baseETHMessage
fields.description: Base ETH message that was signed

fields.name: v
fields.description: ETH signature v component

fields.name: r
fields.description: ETH signature r component

fields.name: s
fields.description: ETH signature s component

fields.name: pqNonce
fields.description: PQ nonce to prevent replay attacks

ETHRemoveRegistrationIntentMessage.description: ETH-controlled removal of a pending registration intent.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Remove registration intent from Epervier Fingerprint

fields.name: pqFingerprint
fields.description: PQ Fingerprint to remove registration intent for

fields.name: ethNonce
fields.description: ETH nonce to prevent replay attacks

PQRemoveRegistrationIntentMessage.description: PQ-controlled removal of a pending registration intent.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Remove registration intent from ETH Address

fields.name: ethAddress
fields.description: ETH Address to remove registration intent for

fields.name: pqNonce
fields.description: PQ nonce to prevent replay attacks

BaseETHChangeETHAddressIntentMessage.description: ETH message that gets signed and embedded in the PQ change address intent.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Intent to change ETH Address and bond with Epervier Fingerprint

fields.name: pqFingerprint
fields.description: PQ Fingerprint to change ETH Address for

fields.name: pattern2
fields.value: to

fields.name: newEthAddress
fields.description: New ETH Address to bind to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: ethNonce
fields.description: ETH nonce to prevent replay attacks

PQChangeETHAddressIntentMessage.description: PQ message containing nested ETH signature and message for change ETH Address intent.

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Intent to change bound ETH Address from

fields.name: oldEthAddress
fields.description: Current ETH Address bound to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: pattern2
fields.value: to

fields.name: newEthAddress
fields.description: New ETH Address to bind to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: baseETHMessage
fields.description: Base ETH message that was signed

fields.name: v
fields.description: ETH signature v component

fields.name: r
fields.description: ETH signature r component

fields.name: s
fields.description: ETH signature s component

fields.name: pqNonce
fields.description: PQ nonce to prevent replay attacks

fields.name: pattern
fields.value: Confirm changing bound ETH Address for Epervier Fingerprint from

fields.name: oldEthAddress
fields.description: Current ETH Address bound to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: pattern2
fields.value: to

fields.name: newEthAddress
fields.description: New ETH Address to bind to the PQ Fingerprint

fields.name: pqNonce
fields.description: PQ nonce to prevent replay attacks
